title: Help the Cursed Monk
content: a in the Basement of Open Hand Temple. Once you return the amulet to Shirra, the ghost inside will possess her body, and ask you if you would take on his madness so he may pass on You can make an optional arcana check to see what the consequences of accepting his madness is. If you agree to accept his madness you will have to make 2 saving throws or you will get a debuff called Monk's Madness which grants a -1 or -2 to your wisdom score depending on if you succeeded on the saving throws.
